customer_reviews.text: I like everything I have ever bought from this brand. Works great on my dry acne prone skin
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin feel amazing! The only thing is that it doesn’t completely mattify my really oily skin, but nothing does.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied and I’ll recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! I have very oily skin and I use this during the day. Absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave me feeling greasy. Also not overly drying. I don’t notice as many breakouts as well. Very satisfied and I’ll recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Rad Student

customer_reviews.title: The smell is atrocious...
customer_reviews.text: I love this company but this product smells SO bad. It's like eucalyptus leaves were left in a compost pile for a couple weeks in the heat of summer
customer_reviews.author: LaneyG

customer_reviews.title: Bad scent
customer_reviews.text: I cannot use this moisturizer. The smell is awful. I purchased the face wash too and although I’m not fond of the scent it’s not as bad as this.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful face lotion, although it leaves my very oily skin too dry in certain spots in the winter. Perfect for summertime, however.
customer_reviews.author: Strela

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: I am 26 and got my first break out of adult acne. I have never had bad skin and if i ever broke out it was during that time of month and only lasted a couple of days. This was worst than ever and lasted for over a month and showed no signs of going away. I tried this product along with the facewash and within 2 wks my skin has cleared up dramatically. I am so pleased with this product!!!! my skin is clear and feels moisturized without being greasy
customer_reviews.author: May-ling

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and this moisturizer has been my go-to since I bought it. One catch is: since one of its main ingredients is tea tree oil, it is pretty drying to the skin thanks to its natural antibacterial properties. I use this every day and get compliments on my complexion all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Agnello

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: To begin with it doesn't deliver on the promise of the product. My nose is cracked up, and I've got skin flakes coming off the corners of my nostrils. It smells like bandages and stings when I put it on. Looks like I need a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryana Grimsley

customer_reviews.title: I love tea tree
customer_reviews.text: This is not a moisturizing lotion so don’t get it if you have dry skin. I have very oily skin and this lotion has been amazing for day time use. I use a thicker cream at night but I love this for day
customer_reviews.author: Melania Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Can be a bit Drying
customer_reviews.text: I like this lotion but it can be a bit drying. I thought maybe because I used with the toner at first but then the next use I didn't use the toner and my face still felt a little dry. It didn't bother me too much because I only use this lotion for night time.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrincess83

customer_reviews.title: I like the face wash that goes with this
customer_reviews.text: I like the face wash that goes with this, but I don't like the moisturizer at all. It dried my face out so bad, I was getting dry spots of skin peeling off. Might be good for super oily skin, but don't use if you have 'normal' only slightly oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Cason

customer_reviews.title: Face acne cleaning is not clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this special acne remover for my daughter's face. After using it for a while, it didn't feel very effective. It was a little itchy after using it
customer_reviews.author: Fangfangliu

customer_reviews.title: Use this daily!!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with The Body Shop products..I use this lotion daily due to oily skin and this lotion does the job well. Will pruchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Really works on acne-like rash from chemotherapy
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a bunch of products to help calm the rash that has manifested all over my face due to chemotherapy. This is the ONLY product that has worked to make it less severe. I doubt that it will go away completely, but after using this moisturizer for about a week, the result is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: malcolm913

customer_reviews.title: Scent is not fruity or sweety but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Scent is not fruity or sweety but does the job for moisturizing. A bit pricey for the size but then it's vegan.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Gabbie

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR OILY SKIN
customer_reviews.text: This product ”mattify’s”, meaning it dries up your skin, your skin will produce MORE oils compensating for the dry ness the lotion gives you. After one night my skin was 3x oily the next morning. 0/10 recommend. It also burns my skin
customer_reviews.author: Jezebelll

customer_reviews.title: Very good moisturizer - especially for people with problem skin
customer_reviews.text: After reading that tea tree oil has natural acne fighting principles, I tried this moisturizer and I like it a lot. I have been using it for over a year now. It is also good for people with oily skin as it is oil controlling. The scent is light (of tea tree) as I don't like heavily scented moiturizers. Overall, this is a good 'guy' product.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: So Stinky!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff STINKS. I loooove all things tea tree but this lotion smelled like burnt rubber or plastic. It was so bad it gave me a headache and I came home to immediately wash it off. So disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Delgado

customer_reviews.title: It ok
customer_reviews.text: This mattifying lotion work ok but I must admit that it not 100% as I live in the Bahamas and it is summer now so I will sweat. It still a good mattiying lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Poeshe

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: This made my skin the worst it's ever been. I now have red scale patches that are all cracked and can't be covered by makeup. Never had them before. Also burns my face when I apply it. I wish Amazon would let me return it. Will not buy items like this on here again.
customer_reviews.author: Eleni

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this product smells great but if you have sensitive skin it burns, and makes it dry
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Paul
